location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Reporting an alteration in the silver coinage of Persia: the replacement of the real [rial] or new Persian rupee with a new coin worth an hazar deenar [1000 dinar], of which ten made a toman. Stannus sends twenty rupees of the new coinage to be assayed.
